nodes.text: Ratch was a male Twi'lek scavenger. He was a captain of his GS-100 salvage ship Raider.

During the Clone Wars, after the Battle of the Sullust system, Ratch and his Weequay crew retrieved an unconscious Asajj Ventress within her damaged Ginivex-class starfighter from the debris. She asked them to take her to Dathomir, and when they wouldn't, they were all killed by her.
